copy.shoppingText: Check out DisneyStore.com for Clickables toys.
copy.badgeTitle: Here's how to collect all of Pixie Hollow's Clickables Badges.
copy.totalCharms: currently has # Clickables exclusive SpeedChat phrases.
copy.clickablesMCTitle: Each Clickables Charm unlocks a new item for your Fairy in Pixie Hollow. Collect them and earn Badges for your Fairy, too!
copy.macWarning: Clickables is not currently support for the Mac operating system.
copy.linuxWarning: Clickables is not currently support for the Linux operating system.
copy.collectAllNature: Collect all the Nature Charms to earn this Badge in Pixie Hollow.
copy.collectAllGarden: Collect all the Garden Charms to earn this Badge in Pixie Hollow.
copy.collectAllAnimal: Collect all the Animal Charms to earn this Badge in Pixie Hollow.
copy.collectAllFF: Collect all the Famous Fairies Charms to earn this Badge in Pixie Hollow.
copy.collectAllCharms: Collect all the Charms to earn this Badge in Pixie Hollow.
copy.loginLink: Log in to view your personal collection.
copy.errorLoadingFAQXML: There was an error loading FAQ.
copy.errorLoadingBadgesXML: There was and error loading Badges.
copy.errorLoadingCharmsXML: There was an error loading Clickables Charms.
copy.phraseNotLoggedInTitle: Clickables toys allow you to get additional SpeedChat phrases in Pixie Hollow! Click bracelets to exchange friendships and get SpeedChat phrases. You can point to these phrases in the SpeedChat menu to chat with other Fairies in Pixie Hollow.
copy.errorLoadingPhrasesXML: There was an error loading Clickables Phrases.
copy.title: Welcome to Clickables™
copy.subTitle: Clickables Fun Stuff
copy.subsubTitle: Here are some fun things you can do!
copy.headerBody: Extend the Fairy fun with Clickables, toys that magically connect real world friends and unlock special treasures inside the world of Pixie Hollow.<font face="Arial" size="18" color="#FFF04C">*</font>
copy.remark: <font face="Arial" size="18" color="#FFF04C">*Toys are only sold in retail stores in the USA.</sont>
copy.needHelp: Need Help?
copy.charmsBody: Each charm unlocks a new item for your Fairy. Collect them and earn badges in Pixie Hollow.
copy.badgesBody: Touch charms to the jewelry box and unlock special clothing, decor and accessories for your Fairy!
copy.phrasesBody: Click Clickables Fairy Friendship Bracelets to receive SpeedChat phrases and become friends in Pixie Hollow.
copy.portraitBody: Play games offline & earn a butterfly to fly with your Fairy. Print your Fairy for your game cover.
